nodes.text: A Naboo Human female was a member of the Naboo Royal Advisory Council around 22 BBY, and thus served as a royal advisor to Queen Jamillia. She was present in the Theed Royal Palace's throne room, along with Governor Sio Bibble and Graf Zapalo, when Senator Padmé Amidala and Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker came to see the Queen to talk about the increasingly disturbing conflict with the Separatists.
This character was portrayed by Josephine Alessio in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
